args: console.log('MCP Ready'); const readline = require('readline'); const rl = readline.createInterface({input: process.stdin, output: process.stdout}); rl.on('line', (input) => { try { const req = JSON.parse(input); const res = {jsonrpc: '2.0', id: req.id, result: {status: 'ok', method: req.method, timestamp: Date.now()}}; console.log(JSON.stringify(res)); } catch(e) { console.log(JSON.stringify({jsonrpc: '2.0', id: 1, error: {code: -1, message: e.message}})); }});
